products.name: Shiaqga Pet Immunity
products.description:
Shiaqga is just as effective with our fur babies. YESSSSS! We’ve tried and tested the Shiaqga with our own pets and many abandoned sick doggies. What we’ve seen is what some would call miracles. The Shiaqga is amazing for maintaining optimal health in those healthy home babies too.


White Sparrow, Medicine Woman writes, "We own two dogs & each morning they get a dose of Shiaqga. Our boy came from an abused and nutrient deficient environment. A few months later, he was top of the line Healthy. I just add a smidgen of Shiaqga in raw meat… along with other superfoods. It’s easy breezy & even great grandma, or Emma the 3 year old. . . can manage it."


Depending on the health condition of your pet, that will determine the dose. Highly toxic pets deserve a tad bit more. It is considered a food so there is no overdose issues. Taking more will only causes detox symptoms. The suggested amount for the size of your healthy animal is on the label. For your more unhealthy friends, you can increase the amount given but use wisdom and pay attention to their behavior and temperature.


As they shift into healing, they will tend to get tired and deserve rest and repair. As their immune system is built and healing occurs, the detoxification effects will lessen. One container should last several months for pets in top notch health. The content is 100% ground Shiaqga.
